author: geonmo
body:
1. Add new plots.
   - strip_phi_dist plots on every chamber are added.
     - These plots can be used to acquire strip's global phi degrees from GEMGeometry.
   - strip_dphi plots for each station are added.
     - These plots include difference between first and last strips from GEMGeometry.
     - It can be used to compare chamber's (designed) phi angle.
   - strip_phiz plots on every chamber are added.
     - These plots has strip digi hit's occupancy plots on chamber.
     - So, it can be used to check of layer's changes.
2. Add configuration for plots.
   - Add configuration to handle global XY plots binning.(by python)
   - Add configuration to change strip_phiz plot's x-axis starting point(-5 degrees) and step(10 degrees).
     - egs) first plot has -5~5 degrees. second plot has 5~15 degrees of x-axis[phi].
3. Bugfix
   - When the gem hits did not matched any GEM detector, it will fail call GeomDet.(When use different version CMSSW.)
     - Skip functions are added. To warning, its error is displayed using std::cout.
4. Macro files
   - Add MakePlot.py to draw looking good plots easily.
   - Add Compare.py which generates plots to compare between different geometries.
5. Migration.
   - To migration 7X, GetByLabel is changed to GetByToken and consume.( obligation of 7X version )
   - Validation modules were modified.
   - Matcher class will be apply later due to refactoring.
title: Update Plots, fix bugs and migration preparation.
